articles.description: New Zealand's Laurel Hubbard was selected to the women's Olympic weightlifting team, making history as Olympic history an openly transgender athlete.
articles.content:
This transgender teen co-wrote A Kids Book About Being Inclusive with the hopes of inspiring children everywhere.
USA TODAY
Laurel Hubbard's journey to the Tokyo Olympic Games goes far beyond medal… [+3991 chars]
